channel.title: Profit-losses on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Profit & Loss
item.description: Overview Here you can see how much your company has earned or has lost during each month of the current year, the “Profie & Loss” row shows you this piece of information. This data is obtained by subtracting from the revenues all the costs faced by the company. The costs can be of various kinds: External costs Payroll G & A Marketing We provide you with two subtotal in order to better undertand the final value of profit & loss for the compamny:
